name: skated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
skate
B1 to move, or make a particular movement on a surface, using skates: The ice on the river is thick enough to skate on/across/over. Let's go skating tomorrow.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen the lake freezes over , we can go skating on it.She skated over to where I was standing.
